findings.rationale: The five-year duration may not protect sensitive information adequately if the nature of the information requires longer confidentiality.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: Allowing injunctive relief without posting a bond can lead to potential misuse and may unfairly favor one party in case of a dispute.
findings.evidence_quote: the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: Restricting assignment may limit flexibility in business operations and could complicate future business transactions.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
